body:
Hi all, 

I am running a thermal comfort assessment in a room with a high level of glazing. I am trying to assess the effect of the windows G-value (or SHGC) on the thermal comfort annually.

However, as I change the G-value of the window the annual PPD in the room stays unchanged, which does not make much sense to me. Can someone think of a likely explanation to this?

Regards,

Alejandro
